name: Stantler

ability.name: Forest Mystic
ability.effect: Once per turn, you may search your deck for a Grass or Psychic Pokemon. Reveal the card to your opponent, shuffle your deck, and place that card on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Green Horn
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage and any Special Conditions from Stantler.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon is now confused.

flavor: These deer protect forests from overdevelopment. As human technology has progressed, they've become more and more rare.
